title: .hack//Another Birth
text: The Story follows the original four .hack video games except, through BlackRose's perspective instead of Kite's. When her younger brother, Fumikazu, falls into a coma while playing The World, Akira decides to figure out the cause and begins to play The World where she meets the Kite. fr:.hack//Another Birth ja:.hack//Another Birth もうひとつの誕生
